alert.note: Alert for Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 6:22PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT MOLOKAI IN MAUI COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM HST... At 621 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kepuhi to 93 miles south of Barbers Point. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hoolehua, Maunaloa, Kualapuu, Kalaupapa National Park, Pukoo, Ualapue, Kaunakakai, Halawa Valley, Kepuhi, Kawela, Kamalo, and Molokai Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward
